Nashville-Davidson.Vanderbilt University College of Arts an: The College of Arts and Science is a liberal arts college at Vanderbilt University located in Nashville, Tennessee. The College confers the Bachelor of Arts degree on undergraduates, and, in conjunction with the Graduate School, the Master of Arts, Master of Science, and the Doctor of Philosophy degrees on graduate students. The College occupies nearly 1.1 million square feet in 23 buildings across the Nashville campus.
